content: प्रसारणं {@--1@} Spreading abroad, extending, increase, diffusing, expanding. {@--2@} Stretching out; as in बाहुप्रसारणं. {@--3@} Surrounding an enemy. {@--4@} Spreading over the country for fuel and grass. {@--5@} The change of a semivowel (य् र् and व्) into a vowel; see संप्रसारण. {@--6@} Displaying, unfolding.
